alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 7:42PM CST until January 30 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Mermentau River Near Mermentau Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Sabine River Near Deweyville Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Vermilion River...including Carencro, Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sabine River...including Burkeville, Bon Wier, Deweyville, Orange...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 745 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Kinder. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of wooded areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 17.0 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Calcasieu River Kinder 16.0 15.8 Sat 7 pm CST 16.7 16.7 15.7 &&
